text:
="preserve">Kerry Hill AO (1943– 26 August 2018) was an Australian architect. He was known for his hotel designs in tropical Asia. He was born in Perth, Western Australia. Hill's best known works are State Theatre Centre of Western Australia and the City of Perth Library. Most of his works were also in Perth and Sydney.
Hill died on 26 August 2018 in Perth at the age of 75.

annotations.surface_form: State Theatre Centre of Western Australia
